title: LoL patcher not launching client
body: So, I'm sure other people are having the same issue, because it's common among all my friends, but does anyone know a potential fix for the client not popping up after you've clicked launch on the launcher?  I've repaired, no dice, I've even uninstalled and re-installed, at one point I re-installed windows (for separate reasons) and decided to install it all from a blank slate, still having the same problem, it takes 1-2 tries sometimes, then other times like last night it takes 20-30 or more before the login screen pops up. It's getting to be a real bother, there's some times where i just give up trying to play because it's so annoying.

replies.body: Ive been having the same problem for a few weeks now.  Its even more annoying cuz on the second time you either have to close LoLclient from Task Manager or you have to wait for the launcher to ask to terminate the already running client.  I did check my adobe versions which are current too.  Im pretty sure the client is still running on AdobeAir.  I would love to know a fix or find that Riot has fixed it in a patch.
or at least acknowledge it's a legitimate bug and not our problem.

> [{quoted}](name=bumsnnoses,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=y9N30O0G,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-26T20:13:40.922+0000)
>
> or at least acknowledge it's a legitimate bug and not our problem.

That's just it: It is not you or any other player.  It is Riot's perpetual issue and they don't even answer support tickets.  They are dead silent on this and other issues since Patches 4.21 and 5,1.

> [{quoted}](name=bumsnnoses,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=y9N30O0G,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-26T20:13:40.922+0000)
>
> or at least acknowledge it's a legitimate bug and not our problem.

yeah, this!!!
i never had problems before, just recently.
But its my setup causing this? i think not!
And i have seen plenty of people complain!

I am not 100% accurate on this, but you can try running your League of Legends in Admin mode, works for me sometimes. 

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin.exe

hey 
roit 
I have the same problem but mine wont work at all even If I run it in admin

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin.exe

No Dice.
Open a support ticket. Let the pros help you with it :)
THANK YOU!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=y9N30O0G,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2015-06-26T09:45:09.675+0000)
>
> Open a support ticket. Let the pros help you with it :)

Uninstalling and reinstalling league fixed it. Sometimes the blatantly obvious things do work.
yeah i run it as admin and same issue arises, but it does work occasionally, nice to see riot actually looks at the forums though.

Try this 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swBOyJQ6wes
this happened to me last night...uninstalling and reinstalling the cliet now :)

This patch and the last one have made my league unplayable, i havent been able to play a game, apart from the once.

What i did was a fresh install, deleted registries, and reinstalled lol and opened the firewall. Worked like a beauty, until i closed the client and went to sleep. The next day i had the same problem once again. Did another fresh install but this time it still does not work.

I have no idea what is going on somebody please help.

My laptop is able to run league perfectly, and my friends are not having this problem

Yeah I have this problem on my PC and I've done all the usual troubleshooting procedures. My laptop doesn't have this problem.

Contacted Tech Support, only to have them treat me like I'm unable to do my own troubleshooting and getting me to redo all the troubleshooting I've already done, while continuously saying that it's on my end. They also can't seem to understand that if it was on our end, we wouldn't be having this problem suddenly after a patch.

They will get you to go through all this Permission related and tracert procedures. If your latency and packet loss to router is higher than usual, they will insist that it's your problem (even if network hasn't changed for years). So just don't bother with Tech Support, you'll be better off waiting for the new client.

> [{quoted}](name=Aerothal,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=y9N30O0G,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-26T19:08:55.431+0000)
>
> For me it usually takes me between 4 and 10 attempts to get into the client!
> I also contacted support.
> All the suggestions they have are aiming to my side as the problem. funny thing is that i never had any issues with that since season 2! just started roughly after patch 4.20 i believe!
> i did go through all of riots suggestions. to no avail.

More proof that Riot just blames it on you instead of acknowledging it's actually a problem.
For Patch 5.9 it just happen to me just redownload it will work. I was about to cry because i was scared league didnt work on my laptop anymore xD

Okay, so it's been a while since I played, but now I'm having a similar if not the same problem (felt it was best to "revive" this thread rather than make a new one...). The patcher seems as if it wants to launch, but as soon as it does, it goes all black excluding the "shoulder" buttons (close, minimize, etc.), what's up guys?!

This seems to happen to me after i close the client and try to reopen it anytime afterwards. Seems to me like the client is not exiting properly. LolClient.exe still shows in my task manager after I close the client.

I have found a workaround for when this does happen to me. If I launch the client from the patcher and the client doesn't show up I can open my task manager, find LolClient.exe in the process list, right-click that and select "Go to process". I can launch the file it points to manually and the client appears and works correctly. I am running Windows 7, and this might not work on Windows 8 since I know they changed the task manager a bit.
I'm on 10 atm, but i'll give it a shot next time it gives me an issue, which should be later today after work.

For me it usually takes me between 4 and 10 attempts to get into the client!
I also contacted support.
All the suggestions they have are aiming to my side as the problem. funny thing is that i never had any issues with that since season 2! just started roughly after patch 4.20 i believe!
i did go through all of riots suggestions. to no avail.
what sometimes (not always) helps is to rightclick on the game shortcut and start as administrator.
sometimes it also helps to hit alt-ctrl-del and go to processes rightclick the launcher and end the process tree and then try to start again.
But in general i have to go through many attempts before it lets me log in!
Yeah last night i had to do it roughly 25 times running as admin before it came up. I've tried all the tricks so to speak and nothing it's getting ridiculous.
